post.title: Static website
post.excerpt: Codoyster creates new websites from scratch. "Static" means: fixed content, but not "fixed" design. You can have all animations you wish on your website.
post.subtitle: html5, css3, assemble.io, javascript, jquery

provide.title: Design

post.title: Dynamic website or webapp
post.excerpt: Based on Node.js and MySQL. Nice option for large websites or web services.
post.subtitle: html5, css3, node.js, es6 and mySQL

provide.title: Design of application
provide.text: Design for mobile, tablet and desktop sizes (or specific breakpoints).

provide.title: Application flow
provide.text: How should application work in different cases? The best option to provide explanation in UML or UML like schema.

deliver.title: Source code
deliver.text: Dynamic website or application source code based on Node.js, Express.js and MySQL

deliver.title: Launch of application
deliver.text: If required we launch your site on hosting provided by you (has to support Node.js) or on one of the free ones e.g. heroku.

deliver.title: Crossbrowser support
deliver.text: FF, Chrome, Safari, IE10+, Android and iOS support. IE9 or lower support for additional fee

post.title: WordPress website
post.excerpt: Building from scratch or with required theme. Perfect for bloggers or those, who wants to update their site content regularly, whithout editing source code.

provide.title: Website design

provide.text: Content, to fill the site. Content can be not final or even fake, as you can manage the site through Wordpress yourself later.

provide.text: There is always something more to say and define. Feel free.
